verses.roman:
iṅhā-sabāra pṛthak vaikuṇṭha--paravyoma-dhāme
pūrvādi aṣṭa-dike tina tina krame

synonyms: iṅhā—of them; sabāra—of all; pṛthak—separate; vaikuṇṭha—a Vaikuṇṭha planet; paravyoma-dhāme—in the spiritual world; pūrva-ādi—beginning from the east; aṣṭa-dike—in the eight directions; tina tina—three in each; krame—in consecutive order.
translation: "All these forms preside over different Vaikuṇṭha planets in the spiritual world, beginning from the east in consecutive order. In each of eight directions, there are three different forms.
